detailsData.title: Experienced Attorney
detailsData.content: Principal Attorney James C. Suits II brings 17 years of experience in litigating challenging civil cases, ensuring knowledgeable and skilled representation for every client.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice
detailsData.content: Suits Litigation, Inc specializes in a wide range of personal injury cases, from motor vehicle accidents to wrongful death, providing clients with a broad spectrum of legal support.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Service
detailsData.content: The firm is committed to providing the highest level of client service, including friendly and compassionate discussions, prompt communications, and a painless litigation experience.

detailsData.title: Integrity and Ethics
detailsData.content: Conducting representation with the utmost integrity and living up to the highest legal and ethical standards is a cornerstone of the firm's philosophy.

subHeading: San Jose Personal Injury & Auto Accident Attorney Near You
valueProp: Suits Litigation, Inc specializes in representing victims who have suffered severe personal injuries as a result of motor vehicle and other accidents caused by the negligence of others. Principal Attorney James C. Suits II received his Juris Doctor degree from the University of Southern California and has 17 years of experience litigating challenging civil cases.

testimonalData.text: Mr. Suits was absolutely 100% responsive and on top of my case. He was sincere and treated me like a person.
testimonalData.author: Suzette

testimonalData.text: James represented me the past two years during a very difficult time. I always felt very comfortable communicating with him.
testimonalData.author: Jenifer

testimonalData.text: I never thought I would say this about an attorney, Mr. Suits is ethical and trustworthy.
testimonalData.author: Nathan
